title: Ban these players RIOT
body:
Pretty sure smirf accounts they don't want ranking up so they int or there just major trolls. nunu steals my red (he supports I am JG) then says accident I am salty but keep playing then he comes over to my blue and takes that as well that's no accident definitely trolls then start telling another team in inting 
 because I had given up at that point not going to play when there are 2 trolls on the team because the anivia was with he nunu painting aswell. so they start telling the other team that im inting and win trading with the opposing jungle which is plainly untrue. Please look into their accounts and ban there ma9ins because I doubt this is the main account likely smirfs I want theese fuckers banned{{summoner:11}} . i will also gladley upload video evidence if anyone wants to see
[REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)]

replies.body: you do know that win trading is not a thing below master/challenger tier right?
Ok so that just means they are trolls ned to be beanned
